You can configure plugin from both the local directory and POM file of your Maven project. 

The POM properties overwrites the same properties defined in the local directory.

You must configure:

 * grinder properties file; 
 * jython test file;

You can also configure optional parameters from the POM file:

 * *daemon_option* -- the default value is FALSE. If you set TRUE, the   agent goal run agent process with *-daemon* option;
 * *daemon_period* -- the default value is 60 seconds. If daemon_option is TRUE, indicates the agent sleep time;

*CONFIGURATION FROM THE LOCAL DIRECTORY*

-- Create src/test/config directory (if not exists) and copy grinder properties file;

-- Create src/test/jython directory (if not exists) and copy jython test file;
